private_key.title: Private Key
private_key.description: Credentials - private key in plain text (will be encrypted by Keboola). Key must be written in one row, each new line must be delimited by \n character

token_uri.title: Token URI
token_uri.description: Authentication token uri : https://oauth2.googleapis.com/token if not specified otherwise

network_code.title: Network Code
network_code.description: You'll find this in the URL when you are logged into your network. For example, in the URL https://admanager.google.com/1234#home, 1234 is your network code.
